title: Comprehensive Hearing Health Tools
subtitle: Comprehensive Hearing Health Tools for tinnitus management and hearing assessment. No downloads required, just headphones and your device.
disclaimerText: An online hearing test performed in an uncontrolled environment cannot replace calibrated tests performed in a sound-proof booth with a professional audiologist. This information should not be considered medical advice. If you have a medical problem, please contact your local physician for diagnosis and treatment.

frequencyFinder.title: Frequency Finder
frequencyFinder.description: Find your tinnitus frequency using an interactive slider with multiple waveform options

audiometer.title: Online Audiometer
audiometer.description: Complete hearing test with interactive audiogram chart for professional assessments

tonalMasker.title: Tonal Tinnitus Masker
tonalMasker.description: Acoustic neuromodulation tool using amplitude and frequency modulation for tinnitus therapy

noiseGenerator.title: Noise Generator
noiseGenerator.description: Create custom white noise with 8-band equalizer and ambient background sounds

notchedNoise.title: Notched Noise
notchedNoise.description: Generate therapeutic notched white noise for tinnitus treatment
